title: Signs Suggesting That You Might Need Glasses
description: These days, you have many choices regarding places to purchase glasses. A growingly popular method is through online retailers. That said, you may be reluctant to get glasses. However, experiencing certain symptoms may leave you with no other choice.  The post Signs Suggesting That You Might Need Glasses appeared first on AV Club.
author: Contributor Content

title: Where Did the Monsters Go? How Serialized TV Killed the Monster of the Week
description: Tired of TV that’s all talk and no terror? It’s time to resurrect the weekly monsters that scared the crap out of us. The post Where Did the Monsters Go? How Serialized TV Killed the Monster of the Week appeared first on TV Fanatic.

title: Bring Back the Grit: Why TV Needs Heroes Who Aren’t Afraid to Get Their Hands Dirty

title: Ghosts EPs Talk Patience’s Unsettling Revelation in Halloween Episode

title: Young Sheldon’s Iain Armitage, In Need of Last-Minute Halloween Costume, Goes as… Young Sheldon
description: And the winner for best Halloween costume goes to… TV’s erstwhile Young Sheldon.  “My costume for this year was supposed to arrive two days ago and still isn’t here. I’m seriously thinking that I might need to go out as Young Sheldon,” Iain Armitage shared on Instagram Thursday. “The good news is that I really […]
